column2:
toks<-tokens(
 corpus,
  what = "word",
  remove_punct = TRUE,
  remove_symbols = TRUE,
  remove_numbers = TRUE,
  remove_url = TRUE,
  remove_separators = TRUE,
  split_hyphens = FALSE,
  split_tags = FALSE,
  include_docvars = TRUE,
  padding = FALSE) %>%
  tokens_remove(stopwords("french"))
Warning: split_tags argument is not used.
